actions.name: Bubble Foam
actions.description: Effect: The user's Water-Type attacks decrease the target's SPD Stage by -1 for 5 Activations, have a 30% increased chance to inflict @Affliction[burn] 5, and consume +30% PP (minimum 1).

system.description: Effect: The user's Water-Type attacks decrease the target's SPD Stage by -1 for 5 Activations, have a 30% increased chance to inflict @Affliction[burn] 5, and consume +30% PP (minimum 1).
